author: davidschor
title: Simple and Effective
review: This is one set that relies on the most basic Lego colors and blocks.  It is a great little car, although not really compatible with the predominant mode of the city and town themes.  It is amazing what can be done with the included 23 pieces.  Simply a classic.

author: hustla187
title: Just another car
review: This car is Ok, but it is too simple. It could have been in minifig scale or in a Technic set. I like the red roof though which I would say is the best part of this set. Everything else just sucks about this set.
